xwikidoc.content:
#** * Welcome text for welcome block on the home page * @translate This page requires full translation * @type content * @refactored ludovic *# Use this area to create a welcome or introduction for group members or visitors. You can update this area regularly to highlight group news, or enter overview content, such as group goals, that you would like to display in this location indefinitely.
*If you do not edit this area, it will not appear in your groupâ€™s Home tab.*
To begin, click "Edit" in the title bar above. Next, delete this Curriki-provided text and enter your own content. Use the toolbar to style or format your text, insert an image or hyperlink, and more. (This section will also accept HTML content.)
